# Dirty: Broken Tables
# Tests table normalization with misaligned columns

| Header 1            | Header 2 | Header 3           |
|---------------------|----------|--------------------|
| Data1               | Data2    | Data3              |
| Data 4              | Data 5   | Data 6             |
| Data7               | Data8    | Data9              |
| Very long data here | Short    | Medium length data |

| Another | Table | With | Different | Column | Count |
|---------|-------|------|-----------|--------|-------|
| Row 1   | Col2  | Col3 | Col4      | Col5   | Col6  |
| Row 2   | Col2  | Col3 | Col4      | Col5   | Col6  |
| Row 3   | Col2  | Col3 | Col4      | Col5   | Col6  |
